abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for interesting items. Today’s selection includes Intel’s push on thin laptops and a bug at Facebook that exposed some private photos.
snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for interesting items. Today’s selection includes Intel’s push on thin laptops and a bug at Facebook that exposed some private photos.
lead_paragraph: Interesting things that Bits reporters and editors found on the Web. More here.

headline.main: Today’s Scuttlebot: Ultraslim Laptops and a Facebook Glitch
